items.name: South Indian Lentil Curry
items.description: Traditional curry made with homemade spice blend, ginger, garlic and tamarind.
items.ingredients: Lentils, homemade spice blend, ginger, garlic, tamarind

items.name: Chicken Gassi
items.description: Marinated chicken cooked with ground spice mix, onion, tomato, ginger and garlic with coconut milk and tamarind. Served with steamed rice and side dishes - papadams, coconut chutney, beetroot yogurt salad, and fried chili.
items.ingredients: Chicken, ground spice mix, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, coconut milk, tamarind, rice, papadams, coconut chutney, beetroot yogurt, fried chili
